title: Update
body: Hi, this is a humble request to update Narada to the latest version as the version you are currently using will not be supported for long. Thank you.

data.body: Hi, we're excited to announce that you can now apply in any IPO from all your **existing accounts** in a single click. All you need to do is to find the Demat ID associated with your existing account and enter it in Narada along with the UPI ID where you want to receive the UPI mandate. You'll be all set to apply in the upcoming IPOs. I've been using it for quite a while now and it made my life 1% easier, maybe it'll make yours too. Thanks!
data.markdown_body: Hi, we're excited to announce that you can now apply in any IPO from all your **existing accounts** in a single click. All you need to do is to find the Demat ID associated with your existing account and enter it in Narada along with the UPI ID where you want to receive the UPI mandate. You'll be all set to apply in the upcoming IPOs. I've been using it for quite a while now and it made my life 1% easier, maybe it'll make yours too. Thanks!
